name: We Bomb (Limited Vinyl)
description:
You might know NYC Graffiti creative crew Elite Gudz from their work making graphic novels for Nuclear Blast and Meshuggah. We know them as good guys making cool stuff, with a total disregard for narrow scene politics, crossing all borders to do their thing. We like. So in this spirit Aaron went to work, and gave this tune the heavy bass treatment. Couldn’t resist...

Side A 1. We Bomb (Phetus feat. Poerilla) 2. We Bomb (Aaron Spectre Remix) 3. We Bomb (Tre Watson Remix) Side B 1. We Bomb (Instrumental) 2. We Bomb (Aaron Spectre Remix Instrumental) 3. We Bomb (Tre Watson Remix Instrumental) The vinyl is an absolutely stunning ULTRA-limited picture disc, and we have a very few copies here. Once they’re gone they’re gone - there is no catalog number and good luck finding em in stores. Digital versions can be found on iTunes and Amazon. This release celebrates Elite Gudz’ Graffiti Spray Can iPhone app, which is rated #1 in the iTunes app store and has been downloaded over 4 million times. The original music video features authentic NYC graffiti artists BL.ONE, JD, DG, Sen2, Soe, Set, Zim, RF, Cees, Pace, PJAY©, Skuf, and Cope2. This is the real deal, kids.

name: Animosity & Drumcorps - Altered Beast / (Cheese)
description:
LIMITED QUANTITIES. Translucent swirled 10" vinyl in improbable color combinations (choose from Cheese, Eggplant or Cupcake), an etched and foil stamped B side, and intense, hallucinatory artwork by John Lause. This EP looks as insane as it sounds!

San Francisco’s legendary Animosity and Drumcorps join forces to hatch the rabid monstrosity of electronics and metal known as "Altered Beast." Clocking in at a slim 10:30, this 10" disc features three tracks from Animal as remixed by Drumcorps. Produced as a limited edition, these are the LAST COPIES as Animosity have recently disbanded. The absolute best sound quality you can get in colored vinyl, from the stems recorded by Animosity at Godcity Studios with the highly respected Kurt Ballou to the remixing by Drumcorps to the mastering by Lupo at Berlin's world-famous Dubplates and Mastering.

name: Aarktica & Aaron Spectre - Ocean EP
description:
Everything an audiophile needs: Mastered by LUPO at world-renowned Dubplates & Mastering in Berlin, Germany and pressed to hefty 160 gram vinyl. Collectors who love the downtempo vibe in Aaron Spectre's out-of-print Lost Tracks LP will rejoice that these records are once again available.

Released shortly after Spectre's relocation to Berlin, The Ocean EP represents a milestone in the personal odyssey of a young musician following his dreams. Each of the four tracks is recognizably Aaron Spectre: his strange but hallmark blend of darkness and optimism, densely layered soundscapes punctuated with airy, ethereal spaces, precision beats, drones, and oddly catchy bits and pieces.  Long-time collaborator Aarktica (Jon DeRosa) adds his soulful vocal talents and sweet-but-melancholy tunes for remix. A perfect soundtrack to set the stage for chilling out and philosophizing.  

"The Wrong Fuel" and "Ocean (Aaron Spectre Remix)" appear on Lost Tracks.

MOONB001 12"
High Quality 160g Audiophile Vinyl
Mastered at D&M Berlin

Aarktica - Ocean (Aaron Spectre remix)
Aaron Spectre - The Wrong Fuel
Aaron Spectre - Sheknows
Aarktica & Aaron Spectre - Alceria
